remarks: Relate elementhood to a closed-below, open-above interval with elementhood to the same open interval or to its lower bound.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Jul-2017.)
statement: elicoelioo $p |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ A < B ) -> ( C e. ( A [,) B ) <-> ( C = A \/ C e. ( A (,) B ) ) ) ) $.
